description:
Works to trees in front garden subject to Islington No. 1 TPO 1961. 

 Works:  1st Lime (next to drive) (T222) - Fell. 

         2nd Lime (next to footpath) (No. TPO) -         Crown lift 5m., crown thin throughout entire crown         by 35%-40%, remove horizontal laterals growing         directly across garden towards house, deadwood. 

         3rd Lime (opposite building) (T223) - Fell. 

         4th Lime (in corner of garden) (T224) - Crown lift         5m., crown thin throughout entire crown by 35%-40%,         remove horizontal laterals growing directly across         garden towards house, deadwood.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
